item.description:
A new extended release of the Lord of the Rings on the big screen where it has to be seen. Almost three hours has been added to the 3 films.  I also posted it on the Hartford Area Movie Meetup.  Each of the three films gets Peter Jackson, the director speaking from New Zealand where he is filming the prequel, The Hobbit.

For tickets, go to www.fathomevents.com The cost $13.50 each.  

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby at 6:30 pm. Film starts at 7:00.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy - The Fellowship of the Rings
